sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RemoteUSAttacher</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RemoteUSAttacher</name><script><![CDATA[var RemoteUSAttacher = Class.create();RemoteUSAttacher.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.ExportWithRelatedLists, { 'attacheUS': function (uniqueValue) { var outputStream = new Packages.java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream(); this.hd = this.beginExport(outputStream); var gr = new GlideRecord(this.parent_table); if (gr.get(this.sys_id)) { this.exportRecord(gr); this.exportChildren(); this._exportQuerySets(); return this.endExport(outputStream); } }, 'endExport': function (outputStream) { this.hd.endElement('', '', 'unload'); this.hd.endDocument(); outputStream.close(); return outputStream.toString(); }, 'type': 'RemoteUSAttacher',});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-31 17:57:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>1280882847d23110a3648c64116d4363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RemoteUSAttacher</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1280882847d23110a3648c64116d4363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 17:57:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>abcdefg</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { // Add your code here var updateExportset = new UpdateSetExport(); var sysId = updateExportset.exportUpdateSet(current); var ga = new GlideSysAttachment(); var sys_remote_update_set_list = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set'); if (sys_remote_update_set_list.get(sysId)) { var exporter = new RemoteUSAttacher(sys_remote_update_set_list.getRecordClassName(), sys_remote_update_set_list.getUniqueValue()), fileName = 'abcd.xml'; exporter.addRelatedList('sys_update_xml', 'remote_update_set'); gs.log(fileName + '\t' + ga.write(current, fileName, 'text/xml', exporter.attacheUS()),'ha-log'); }})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-31 17:28:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9a593b1047d23110a3648c64116d43c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>abcdefg</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9a593b1047d23110a3648c64116d43c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 18:12:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9a593b1047d23110a3648c64116d43c9"/></record_update>
